Team Fortress 2 is a free to play first person shooter. I have played this game for about three to four years now, and I still enjoy countless hours in it. It was the first game I played alongside Terraria and Garry’s mod. What makes it unique is that the conflict is presented in a comical style. There are still many players found playing Team Fortress 2 right now. 

As you play you can unlock more items or weapons which you can use in your fight. You can also of course trade with others for loot; just make sure they’re trustworthy. There is an aspect of play for everyone in this game. There are different classes for each play style such as support, defend and attack. In total there are nine different classes that you can choose from including classes like sniper, scout and medic. 

Even though you may not be good you first initially start and pick up the game, as you play and spend more hours in-game your skills and technique will improve. Once you get a class mastered you will find fun and enjoyment in this game. The majority of the players in-game or on your team do not really care if you are good or not and that is another aspect of Team Fortress 2. There are also many servers to play on and there are even practice/tutorial servers to help you improve your skills, or master a class to play. 

Team Fortress 2 also has many game modes such as capture the flag, and control points. There are also other games like pass time. As you play the game you will be able to find a game mode that you enjoy the most. Along with the abundance of game modes there are also a lot of maps to experience with different environmental settings. 

In the end, I would say that this is a really good game to install and play when you have time because there is not much more like it for free. As you play the game you will grow to a higher level. This game also has a numerous amount of achievements for those achievement hunters. Whether you are a skilled individual or a beginner this game has oppertunities for everyone to experience.

[h1]TF2是我入手的第一款游戏也是我游戏时长最高的一款游戏(超过180小时)
作为一款我深爱的游戏,我有必要给它写一篇评测
它是一款好游戏,免费游戏,良心游戏,非付费和付费玩家的清真游戏
游戏在于技术而不是游戏内的道具
玩得久也就玩得好,越玩你就越喜欢这一款游戏
和朋友一起玩,其乐无穷.
感谢TF2让我记住与朋友在一起组队玩的美好时光
